item.title: “A Hitchhiker’s Guide to R for Data Science (2e)”; RPIrates Monthly Meeting (Weds, 15 Oct, 6p, AE217)
item.description: RPI R users are invited to the October 2025 meeting of RPIrates: The RPI R Users Group! Our topic for Weds, 15 Sep (6p, AE217) will be “A Hitchhiker’s Guide to ‘R for Data Science (2e)’”. Whether you are new to R or consider yourself a veteran, you’ll gain a new appreciation of the R language and platform through the lens of R4DS! RPIrates is led by Dr. John S. Erickson, Director of Research Operations of the Rensselaer IDEA and Chief Instigator of RPIrates. Pizza and salad starts at 5:30p.

item.title: Lally Rally | Oct. 15
item.description: Join Epsilon Delta Sigma for the Lally Rally on Wednesday, October 15th from 1–3 PM on the 5th Floor of the Pittsburgh Building. The event will feature a State of the School Address from Dean Wagman, interactive round table discussions, and a Mario Kart tournament. Food will be provided. Don’t miss this opportunity to engage with the Lally community, share your insights, and connect with fellow students in a fun and welcoming environment.

item.title: RPI at Work Information Session on Friday, October 17
item.description: Date: Friday, October 17, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - RPI at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., will be reviewing the online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates. Expect to hear details about how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment. Please RSVP if you plan to attend and learn more about RPI at Work.

item.title: “An Earth Science-based inversion problem using gradient descent optimization” RPI Quantum Users’; Group Meeting (Weds, 15 Oct, 4p, AE214)
item.description: The first RPI Quantum Users’ Group meeting of the semester will be held on Wednesday, Oct 15 in AE 214 from 4-5 pm. We will have a presentation of an Earth Science-based inversion problem using gradient descent optimization. Contact Tom Morgan morgat5@rpi.edu for more information.

item.title: Early Morning Network Maintenance Scheduled for October 18
item.description: Due to necessary hardware maintenance, a scheduled network outage will take place from approximately 5:00AM to 7:00AM on Saturday, October 18. During this time, both on- and off-campus network connectivity will be unavailable, including wired and wireless connectivity, IP phones, and any other service which relies on network connectivity.

item.title: TIAA Confidential Counseling (In-Person) | Oct. 22
item.description: Wednesday, October 22, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Become better informed and more confident about RPI’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. item.title: Rensselaer Faculty and Staff In Person Workshop - Reviewing Supported Whiteboarding Tools On Campus for Courses or Meetings | Oct. 21
item.description:
Tuesday, October 21, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - This workshop looks at two supported whiteboarding tools available on campus. 1) the whiteboard feature in Webex. 2) a tool is in Box, called Canvas. This session will offer an overview on these two similar tools giving you an opportunity to learn a little more about them and potentially consider using them in your classroom or meeting space. Please register for this session by 10/17 using the link in the See section. Space is limited.
